attributes.action: Let pub owners decide to be smoking or non smoking pubs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My pub is private property, my house, my front room, it should be up to me to choose if i wanna be smoking or non smoking, then the public can choose if they wanna come in or not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
